content: This action will remove the configured API key and disconnect the web search integration. AI chats will no longer be able to access real-time information from the internet until a new key is added.

comment.text: This text explains the effect of resetting the web search integration. It appears within a dialog to inform users that resetting will remove the API key and prevent AI chats from accessing real-time web information until a new key is added. Translators should convey the loss of internet access for AI chats.

usage.context:
return (
 <ModalDialog visible displayType={ModalDialogType.modal} onClose={onClose}>
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("Settings:ResetSettings")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <Text>
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="ResetWebSearchDescription" ns="AISettings" />
 </Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 primary
